works.description:
The text from our site has been used in a black hat SEO technique page to mention our brand name but take web users to numerous links throughout our copy that go to a site we are not affiliated with. It not only infringes our copyright but misleads readers to think there is an association between our company and the links/belts it goes to. Our content on our site is for example "
Exciting new website that will ignite your lust for belts – 9 June 2009
An exciting new website dedicated to bringing the women of the Europe the best choice of quality belts and inspiration on how to wear them to look fabulous, has gone live at onceuponabelt.com. The strap line “It started with a belt…” came about because with women's belts this gorgeous you will now be picking out clothes to wear with your belt and not vice versa. That’s what Marta Eleniak found when she was doing her research. She’s had a great response to the collection, bringing out a love of belts women didn’t know they had, as you just don’t see these types of belts readily in shops."
